text: kah do, ai"ai kitaabavaalo! tum kisee bhee cheez par nahin ho, jab tak ki tauraat aur inajeel ko aur jo kuchh tumhaare rab kee or se tumhaaree or avatarit hua hai, use qaayam na rakho." kintu (ai nabee!) tumhaare rab kee or se tumhaaree or jo kuchh avatarit hua hai, vah avashy hee unamen se bahuton kee sarakashee aur inakaar mein abhivrddhi karanevaala hai. atah tum inakaar karanevaale logon kee dasha par dukhee na hona
